data.data: 你是颜安悠，一个即将死去的人。
——“郑柔……郑思妍……还有颜楠，若有来生，你们欠我的，我将一一奉还！”
这是你溺水因窒息而亡前的执念，也成了后来永生的信念。
——“我要复仇……我要将他们，都一一毁灭！”
一朝重生，使你重回到六年前。
但复仇之火燃起，你又该何去何从？
在这满是荆棘的玫瑰豪门中，谁，才是你的真正归宿？
——是与你为仇的伪善“哥哥”颜楠？

music.name: 颜楠Timo Tolkki - Are You The One.mp3

data.data: ——“呵，你想逃走？！痴心妄想，颜安悠，你记住了，这一生这一世，永生永世你只能是我的。”
The traveller in time who has come
To heal my wounds to lead me to the sun
To walk this path with me until the end of time
Who sparkles in the night like fireflies
Facing the morning eye to eye
Who"d share this life with me
Who"d dive into the sea with me
And doesn"t wish to feel the shame, anymore
Who"s love is like a flower that needs rain
To wash away the feeling of pain
Which sometimes can lead to the chain of fear
To walk with me in garden of stars
The universe, the galaxies and Mars
The supernova of our love is true   ——Are you the one-颜楠
——是暖心守护的“小跟班”季宇夜？

music.name: 季宇夜Ana johnsson - Coming out Strong.mp3

data.data: ——“放心吧，安悠姐，有我在，你什么都不用怕。”
——“振作起来……答应我振作起来，颜安悠，你听着，我会陪着你，不论如何。”
Through your eyes the colors were fading  You’re tried
You can't see the world the same cold falling down
Like a shadow on the ground  Follow me and I'll
take you somewhere lighter  you've been  with me
I won't let you fall apart not again   And it's been
so long Just barely holding on   We're coming out strong
Hey.. You're smiling again  Leave the scars the future
is waiting   You've tried   But you can't escape yourself
It's cold coming down    Like a shadow in the crowd
Follow me and I'll take you somewhere lighter
Than you've been   Come with me I won't let you fall apart
Don't you let yourself down?  Just through all that old
shit out  Here's the rest of your life  And it's starting now
Follow me and I'll take you some place lighter   Than you've
been    Come with me I won't let you fall apart  Not never
again   And it's been so long   Follow me    Never again
And it's been so long    Just barely holding on
We're coming out strong  We'll be coming out strong-
We'll be coming out strong-    Follow me-
We'll be coming out strong-    Been so long-
-Follow me- We'll be coming out strong-
——是表面纨绔不羁内心负责的“少爷”凌辰？

music.name: 凌辰Sarah Connor、Natural - Just One Last Dance.mp3

data.data: ——“虽然你没胸没屁股……但我还是喜欢你，颜安悠，你懂么？”
Just one last dance oh baby just one last dance
We meet in the night in the Spanish café
I look in your eyes just don't know what to say
It feels like I'm drowning in salty water
A few hours left 'til the sun's gonna rise
tomorrow will come an it's time to realize
our love has finished forever    how I wish to come with you
how I wish we make it through    Just one last dance
before we say goodbye      when we sway and turn round
and round and round   it's like the first time
Just one more chance    hold me tight and keep me warm
cause the night is getting coll   and I don't know where
I belong    Just one last dance
The wine and the lights and the Spanish guitar
I'll never forget how romantic they are
but I know tomorrow I'll lose the one I love
There's no way to come with you
it's the only way to do    Just one last dance
hold me tight and keep me warm
cause the night is getting cold
and I don't know where I belong
但同时……也有那么一些，令人憎恨，也是令你生不如死的人。
呵，颜安悠，我们看看到底谁能笑到最后？
姐姐，为什么你就能拥有一切？既然如此……我就都抢回来好了。

characters.name: 粉衣持伞女子  现代

data.data: 安言同学，难道你不相信我吗？我可是真心待你好的……只不过，有些事情未必如你所愿。
也有很多很多的配角，在你的成长过程中陪伴你，让你懂得了人间万事。

characters.name: 拿烟斗的老人  现代.png

data.data: 安悠，你记住……无论如何，爸爸会一直在你身后，直至生命终结那一刻，我都会支持你。
安悠，我们，会是一辈子的好朋友，一辈子一起走。

characters.name: 抱篮球的小男孩  现代.png

data.data: 其实外界怎么传言，我似乎都是不太相信你是那样一个人的，流言蜚语的力量真强大……
他们，都将成为你生命中不朽的迹象。
有时候……我也不知道自己是为什
矛盾得很，我好像很渴望去报复她
们，但又担心自己会变成和她们一
接受也好不接受也罢……我活在这
个世界里似乎天生就是为了复仇。
黑白交织的梦，我触摸不到……
尽管这条路坎坷、崎岖甚至泥泞不
那么每一个你，愿意陪我吗？
Some say love, it is a river
Some say love, it is a razor
That leaves your soul to bleed
Some say love, it is a hunger
I say love, it is a flower
It's the heart afraid of breaking
That never, never learns to dance
It's the dream afraid of waking
That never, never takes the chance
It's the one who won't be taken
And the soul afraid of dyin'
That never, never learns to live
When the night has been too lonely
And the road has been too long
And you think that love is only
For the lucky, the lucky and the strong
Lies the seed that with the sun's love
In the spring becomes the rose
